deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Little Apple v1::Level 1 - Building Blocks::Reading
deckInfo.description: Character-first cards building from characters to compounds to key phrases from 'My Little Apple' - comprehensive vocabulary coverage

conceptGroups.description: Essential personal pronouns from the song

cards.back:
[sound:wo3.mp3]

(wǒ) I, me

First person pronoun - the singer

[sound:ni3.mp3]

(nǐ) you

Second person pronoun - the beloved

[sound:ni_de.mp3]

(nǐ de) your, yours

你 + 的 = you + possessive particle

[sound:wo_de.mp3]

(wǒ de) my, mine

我 + 的 = I + possessive particle

conceptGroups.description: Vocabulary about planting, seeds, and growth from the opening verse

cards.back:
[sound:zhong4.mp3]

(zhòng) plant, grow

To plant seeds or crops

[sound:xia4.mp3]

(xià) down, below; plant/put down

Direction word, used in 种下 (plant down)

[sound:zhong_xia.mp3]

(zhòngxià) plant, sow

种 + 下 = to plant something in the ground

[sound:yi_ke.mp3]

(yīkē) one (measure word for small round objects)

一 + 颗 = one + classifier for seeds, fruits, hearts

[sound:zhong_zi.mp3]

(zhǒngzi) seed

种 + 子 = plant + child = seed

[sound:zhang3.mp3]

(zhǎng) grow, become longer

Growth and development

[sound:chu1.mp3]

(chū) out, emerge

Coming out or forth

[sound:zhang_chu.mp3]

(zhǎngchū) grow out, sprout

长 + 出 = grow + out = to grow and emerge

[sound:guo_shi.mp3]

(guǒshí) fruit, result

果 + 实 = fruit + actual = literal fruit or metaphorical result

[sound:shou_huo.mp3]

(shōuhuò) harvest, reap

收 + 获 = collect + obtain = to harvest

conceptGroups.description: Words related to time, days, and temporal expressions

cards.back:
[sound:jin_tian.mp3]

(jīntiān) today

今 + 天 = this + day = today

[sound:ri_zi.mp3]

(rìzi) day, date

日 + 子 = sun + child = day/date

[sound:mei_tian.mp3]

(měitiān) every day

每 + 天 = each + day = every day

[sound:ming_tian.mp3]

(míngtiān) tomorrow

明 + 天 = bright + day = tomorrow

[sound:zhong_yu.mp3]

(zhōngyú) finally, at last

终 + 于 = end + at = finally

[sound:yong_yuan.mp3]

(yǒngyuǎn) forever, always

永 + 远 = eternal + far = forever

conceptGroups.description: The four seasons and related seasonal imagery

cards.back:
[sound:chun_tian.mp3]

(chūntiān) spring

春 + 天 = spring + sky = spring season

[sound:xia_tian.mp3]

(xiàtiān) summer

夏 + 天 = summer + sky = summer season

[sound:qiu_tian.mp3]

(qiūtiān) autumn, fall

秋 + 天 = autumn + sky = autumn season

[sound:dong_tian.mp3]

(dōngtiān) winter

冬 + 天 = winter + sky = winter season

[sound:you4.mp3]

(yòu) again, also

Repetition or addition - used in 春天又来到了

[sound:lai_dao.mp3]

(láidào) arrive, come to

来 + 到 = come + arrive = to arrive

conceptGroups.description: Heavenly bodies that appear in the romantic metaphors

cards.back:
[sound:tai_yang.mp3]

(tàiyáng) sun

太 + 阳 = great + yang = sun

[sound:yue_liang.mp3]

(yuèliàng) moon

月 + 亮 = moon + bright = moon

[sound:xing_xing.mp3]

(xīngxīng) stars

星 + 星 = star + star = stars (reduplicated)

[sound:zhai_xia.mp3]

(zhāixià) pick, pluck down

摘 + 下 = pick + down = to pick and take down

[sound:zhuai_xia.mp3]

(zhuāixià) pull down, yank down

拽 + 下 = pull + down = to pull down forcefully

[sound:sheng_qi.mp3]

(shēngqǐ) rise, ascend

升 + 起 = rise + up = to rise up

[sound:hong2.mp3]

(hóng) red

The color red

[sound:hong_hong_de.mp3]

(hóng hóng de) reddish, very red

红 + 红 + 的 = red + red + particle = reddish/very red

[sound:xiao_lian.mp3]

(xiǎoliǎn) little face

小 + 脸 = small + face = little face

[sound:bai_yun.mp3]

(báiyún) white clouds

白 + 云 = white + cloud = white clouds

[sound:lan_tian.mp3]

(lántiān) blue sky

蓝 + 天 = blue + sky = blue sky

[sound:jin_se.mp3]

(jīnsè) golden, gold color

金 + 色 = gold + color = golden

[sound:hua1.mp3]

(huā) flower

Flowers and blossoms

[sound:kai1.mp3]

(kāi) open, bloom

To open or bloom (flowers)

[sound:hua_kai.mp3]

(huākāi) flowers bloom

花 + 开 = flower + bloom = flowers blooming

[sound:shan_po.mp3]

(shānpō) hillside, slope

山 + 坡 = mountain + slope = hillside

[sound:hua_cong.mp3]

(huācóng) flower cluster, flower bed

花 + 丛 = flower + cluster = flower bed

[sound:mai_tian.mp3]

(màitián) wheat field

麦 + 田 = wheat + field = wheat field

[sound:xue_hua.mp3]

(xuěhuā) snowflake

雪 + 花 = snow + flower = snowflake

[sound:fei_wu.mp3]

(fēiwǔ) flutter, dance in the air

飞 + 舞 = fly + dance = to flutter/dance

conceptGroups.description: Words expressing love, affection, and emotions

cards.back:
[sound:ai4.mp3]

(ài) love

The verb and noun for love

[sound:xi_huan.mp3]

(xǐhuān) like, enjoy

喜 + 欢 = happy + joy = to like

[sound:huan_xi.mp3]

(huānxǐ) joy, happiness

欢 + 喜 = joy + happy = happiness

[sound:xin1.mp3]

(xīn) heart, mind

The heart, both physical and emotional

[sound:xin_wo.mp3]

(xīnwō) heart, innermost feelings

心 + 窝 = heart + nest = heart/inner feelings

[sound:wen_nuan.mp3]

(wēnnuǎn) warm, warmth

温 + 暖 = warm + warm = warmth

[sound:tao_yan.mp3]

(tǎoyàn) dislike, hate

讨 + 厌 = demand + dislike = to dislike

[sound:xin_xian.mp3]

(xīnxiān) fresh, new

新 + 鲜 = new + fresh = fresh/new

[sound:huo3.mp3]

(huǒ) fire

Fire, flame, or passionate energy

[sound:dian_liang.mp3]

(diǎnliàng) light up, illuminate

点 + 亮 = point + bright = to light up

[sound:zhao_liang.mp3]

(zhàoliàng) illuminate, light up

照 + 亮 = shine + bright = to illuminate

[sound:yang_guang.mp3]

(yángguāng) sunlight, sunshine

阳 + 光 = yang + light = sunlight

[sound:can_lan.mp3]

(cànlàn) brilliant, splendid

灿 + 烂 = brilliant + splendid = brilliant

[sound:hei_ye.mp3]

(hēiyè) dark night

黑 + 夜 = black + night = dark night

[sound:hei_an.mp3]

(hēi'àn) dark, darkness

黑 + 暗 = black + dark = darkness

[sound:la_zhu.mp3]

(làzhú) candle

蜡 + 烛 = wax + candle = candle

[sound:ran_shao.mp3]

(ránshāo) burn, combust

燃 + 烧 = ignite + burn = to burn

conceptGroups.description: Concepts about life, meaning, and lasting things

cards.back:
[sound:sheng_ming.mp3]

(shēngmìng) life

生 + 命 = birth + fate = life

[sound:yi_yi.mp3]

(yìyì) meaning, significance

意 + 义 = intention + righteousness = meaning

[sound:duan3.mp3]

(duǎn) short

Short in length or time

[sound:bu_li_bu_qi.mp3]

(bù lí bù qì) never leave, never abandon

不 + 离 + 不 + 弃 = not + leave + not + abandon = never abandon

[sound:xi_wang.mp3]

(xīwàng) hope, wish

希 + 望 = rare + look toward = hope

conceptGroups.description: Distinctive phrases that define the song's character

cards.back:
[sound:xiao_ya_xiao.mp3]

(xiǎo ya xiǎo) little oh little

小 + 呀 + 小 = little + oh + little = affectionate diminutive

[sound:ping_guo.mp3]

(píngguǒ) apple

苹 + 果 = apple + fruit = apple

[sound:xiao_ping_guo.mp3]

(xiǎo píngguǒ) little apple

小 + 苹果 = little + apple = little apple (term of endearment)

[sound:zen_me.mp3]

(zěnme) how, how much

怎 + 么 = how + what = how/how much

[sound:bu_xian_duo.mp3]

(bù xiánduō) not too much, never too much

不 + 嫌 + 多 = not + dislike + much = never too much

[sound:tian_bian.mp3]

(tiānbiān) horizon, edge of sky

天 + 边 = sky + edge = horizon

[sound:yun_duo.mp3]

(yúnduǒ) cloud

云 + 朵 = cloud + classifier = cloud

[sound:zui_mei_de.mp3]

(zuì měi de) most beautiful

最 + 美 + 的 = most + beautiful + particle = most beautiful

conceptGroups.description: Action words describing movement, activities, and behaviors

cards.back:
[sound:song4.mp3]

(sòng) give, send

To give or send as a gift

[sound:gei3.mp3]

(gěi) give, to

To give or for/to someone

[sound:song_gei.mp3]

(sòng gěi) give to, present to

送 + 给 = send + to = give to

[sound:bian_cheng.mp3]

(biànchéng) become, turn into

变 + 成 = change + become = to become

[sound:xian_gei.mp3]

(xiàn gěi) dedicate to, offer to

献 + 给 = dedicate + to = dedicate to

[sound:man_bu.mp3]

(mànbù) stroll, walk leisurely

漫 + 步 = leisurely + step = to stroll

[sound:pei2.mp3]

(péi) accompany, keep company

To accompany or be with someone

[sound:kan4.mp3]

(kàn) look, watch, see

To look at or watch

[sound:zha_yan.mp3]

(zhǎyǎn) blink, twinkle

眨 + 眼 = blink + eye = to blink/twinkle

[sound:chang_yang.mp3]

(chángyáng) wander, roam

徜 + 徉 = wander + roam = to wander leisurely

conceptGroups.description: Specific times of day and temporal phrases

cards.back:
[sound:ye_wan.mp3]

(yèwǎn) evening, night

夜 + 晚 = night + evening = nighttime

[sound:huang_hun.mp3]

(huánghūn) dusk, twilight

黄 + 昏 = yellow + dusk = twilight

[sound:cong_bu.mp3]

(cóng bù) never

从 + 不 = from + not = never

conceptGroups.description: Important grammatical particles and connecting words

cards.back:
[sound:de.mp3]

(de) possessive particle

Shows possession or description

[sound:le.mp3]

(le) completion particle

Shows completed action or change

[sound:shi4.mp3]

(shì) is, am, are

The 'to be' verb

[sound:jiu4.mp3]

(jiù) then, just

Connector showing result or emphasis

[sound:rang4.mp3]

(ràng) let, make, allow

Causative verb - to let/make someone do something

[sound:wei4.mp3]

(wéi) for, because of

Preposition meaning 'for' or 'because of'

[sound:zhi_wei.mp3]

(zhǐ wéi) only for, just to

只 + 为 = only + for = only for

[sound:zhi_yao.mp3]

(zhǐyào) as long as, only need

只 + 要 = only + want = as long as

[sound:sui1.mp3]

(suī) although

Although, even though (often paired with 但)

[sound:yu3.mp3]

(yǔ) and, with

Formal conjunction meaning 'and' or 'with'

[sound:he2.mp3]

(hé) and, with

Common conjunction meaning 'and' or 'with'
